data.title: Holiday Rentals in Sant'antonio Di Gallura. Italy villas
data.meta_description: Vacation rentals in Sant'antonio Di Gallura. These holiday rentals are located in Sardinia, Italy. Beautiful villas and apartments available | Search Results 1 - 20 of 250
data.text:
Description

Property Summary

Discover a beautiful and comfortable holiday rental in the heart of Porto Cervo, Arzachena, Italy. The "Le Antunne" development, built in 2000, offers a sunny position just 700 meters from the sea. Enjoy shared amenities like a 10,000 square meter garden and a seasonal swimming pool (15 x 6 meters, available from May 20 to September 29). The property also features private garden furniture, a barbecue area, and air conditioning (extra charge). With motor access and parking at the house, you can easily explore the surrounding area.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the beauty of the surrounding outdoor spaces. The "Le Antunne" development boasts a shared garden spanning 10,000 square meters, providing ample space for relaxation and recreation. Additionally, you can take a refreshing dip in the seasonal swimming pool, measuring 15 x 6 meters and open from May 20 to September 29. Your private outdoor area includes garden furniture and a barbecue, perfect for alfresco dining and enjoying the warm Italian climate.

Other Information

The "Le Antunne" development consists of 13 terraced and single houses, offering a variety of accommodation options. Please note that a transit road and a bus parking lot are located next to the residence. Children and babies must be included in the maximum number of people indicated for each booking, with a maximum of one extra child under 2 years old allowed with a compulsory crib. Check-in is by appointment only, and for arrivals after 9 PM, you must contact the keyholder in advance and book a check-in after official hours for a cost of â‚¬30. Otherwise, key collection will take place the following day, also by appointment.

Distances and Attractions

Conveniently situated in Porto Cervo, the property offers easy access to various nearby attractions and amenities. Enjoy the sandy beach just 700 meters away, or explore the surrounding areas, including Olbia (28 km), Capo Ferro (6 km), Capriccioli (8 km), Baja Sardinia (8 km), Cannigione (16 km), and Porto Rotondo (27 km). Within a 200-meter radius, you'll find a grocery store, supermarket, shopping center, restaurant, and bar, ensuring all your vacation rental needs are met. Le Antunne

Description

Property Summary

Pantogia: Luxurious villa "Paradiso" is a two-story vacation rental situated in a quiet, sunny, elevated position on a slope in a residential area of villas, just 2 km from the center of Porto Cervo. The property boasts a private 2,000 sqm lot with a 1,500 sqm garden, a seasonal swimming pool (9 x 13 m, depth 160 - 180 cm, available from May 7 to September 30), an outdoor shower, a patio (15 sqm), garden furniture, and a barbecue. It offers amenities such as Internet WiFi, parking on the premises, and a yard.

Outdoors

The villa's outdoor spaces are truly luxurious. The 1,500 sqm garden provides ample space for relaxation and enjoyment. The seasonal swimming pool (9 x 13 m, depth 160 - 180 cm, available from May 7 to September 30) is a highlight, offering refreshing dips during the warm summer months. An outdoor shower, patio (15 sqm), garden furniture, and a barbecue area create the perfect setting for alfresco dining and entertaining.

Other Information

Motor access to the villa is available, ensuring convenient accessibility. Parking is available on the premises, and additional public parking can be found on the road. The villa is conveniently located near various amenities, with a supermarket 2 km away, a restaurant and bar within 1 km, and a sandy beach just 2 km from the property. A sports harbor is also located 3 km away, offering additional recreational opportunities.

Distances and Attractions

The villa is situated in Arzachena, Italy, and is well-positioned to explore nearby attractions. Olbia, Golfo Aranci, and Palau are all located approximately 30 km away, while the charming town of S Teresa di Gallura is just 50 km from the property. With its convenient location, the villa offers easy access to various local points of interest, enhancing your holiday rental experience. Paradiso

Description

Property Summary

This large, comfortable villa "Cala Volpe" is located in the hamlet Abbiadori, a residential area with villas, just 2 km from the sea and 3.5 km from the beach in Arzachena, Italy. The property boasts a private swimming pool (6 x 3 m, depth 100 - 150 cm, seasonal availability: 01.Apr. - 31.Oct.), a yard, internet WiFi, and parking on the premises. Enjoy the convenience of having a washing machine within the villa and easy motor access, just 10 m away. When searching for a vacation rental, this villa offers a prime location and desirable amenities.

Outdoors

The villa features a private swimming pool measuring 6 x 3 m with a depth of 100 - 150 cm, available seasonally from April 1st to October 31st. You can relax and enjoy the outdoor space, which includes a yard and parking for up to 5 vehicles on the premises.

Other Information

The villa is situated in a residential area with villas, just 2 km from the sea and 3.5 km from the sandy beach "Piccolo Pevero". You'll find a supermarket within 700 m, and restaurants and bars are just 500 m away. The property is accessed via a stepped path, and a car is recommended due to its location.

Distances and Attractions

Nearby attractions include Cala di Volpe (2 km), Siaggia del principe (5 km), Baja Sardinia (12 km), Porto Rotondo (20 km), and Olbia (25 km). The residence is secured with electric gates, ensuring your privacy and safety during your holiday rental stay. Cala Volpe

Description

Property Summary

Nestled in the picturesque district of Cala di Volpe, just 8 km from the vibrant center of Porto Cervo and 4 km from Abbiadori, House "Roccia di Volpe" offers a luxurious vacation rental experience. This stunning property boasts a spacious 3,000 m2 fenced area with a terraced garden, a wildlife garden, and mature trees. The highlight is the kidney-shaped swimming pool (18 x 5 m, depth 80 - 200 cm), available for use from April 15 to October 15. With an outdoor shower, terrace, garden furniture, and a barbecue area, you can truly embrace the outdoor lifestyle. Furthermore, the property provides ample parking spaces for up to two cars and easy access, making it an ideal choice for a relaxing getaway.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the natural beauty surrounding House "Roccia di Volpe". The property boasts a sprawling 3,000 m2 fenced area, complete with a terraced garden adorned with a wildlife garden and lush trees. Escape the hustle and bustle of daily life by taking a refreshing dip in the kidney-shaped swimming pool, measuring 18 x 5 m with a depth ranging from 80 to 200 cm. The pool is available for seasonal use from April 15 to October 15. Unwind on the terrace, equipped with comfortable garden furniture, or fire up the barbecue and savor alfresco dining. An outdoor shower adds an extra touch of convenience. Please note that the stairway to the pool has open railings in some areas and no railings in others, so small children should be accompanied by adults.

Other Information

House "Roccia di Volpe" offers easy access with motor access to the house via a 20 m unmade road, and a 20 m footpath leading directly to the property. Enjoy the convenience of having a supermarket just 4 km away, and the sandy beach "La Celvia" is a mere 400 m from the house, perfect for lazy beach days. For those who enjoy a round of golf, a prestigious 18-hole golf course is located just 2.5 km away. The property is well-maintained, with the pool receiving regular maintenance from the owner or gardener.

Distances and Attractions

While staying at House "Roccia di Volpe," you'll have the opportunity to explore the surrounding areas and attractions. The property is situated in the district of Cala di Volpe, just 8 km from the center of Porto Cervo, a lively town known for its upscale restaurants, boutiques, and vibrant nightlife. Abbiadori's center is a mere 4 km away, offering a glimpse into the local culture and cuisine. For those seeking a beach getaway, the beautiful sandy beach "La Celvia" is conveniently located just 400 m from the property. Additionally, Baia Sardinia's center, a popular tourist destination, is only 15 km away, providing ample opportunities for sightseeing and exploring the region's rich history and natural beauty. Roccia Di Volpe

Description

Property Summary

You will be staying at the Resort "Bougainvillae", a 3-story complex built in 1985 with 70 apartments. This vacation rental offers amenities such as a swimming pool, yard, internet WiFi, and the option of an installment plan. Enjoy the well-kept garden with plants and trees surrounding the property.

Outdoors

The Resort "Bougainvillae" features a shared outdoor swimming pool measuring 15 x 10 meters with a depth of 250 cm. The pool is available seasonally from June 1st to September 30th, with opening hours from 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM and 3:00 PM to 8:00 PM. An outdoor shower is also provided for your convenience.

Other Information

The complex offers additional facilities including a reception area and a restaurant. Public parking is available on-site. Nearby, you'll find a shop and supermarket within 300 meters, and the sandy beach "Spiaggia dei Gigli" is just 300 meters away. For golfing enthusiasts, an 18-hole golf course is located 5 kilometers from the property. Airport transfer services to the holiday rental can be arranged upon request.

Distances and Attractions

The Resort "Bougainvillae" is conveniently located 1.5 kilometers from the center of Porto Cervo, on the outskirts of the town. It is situated 5 kilometers from the center of Baia Sardinia, 15 kilometers from the center of Arzachena, Italy, and just 300 meters from the sea. Additionally, a marina is within 300 meters, providing easy access for boating and water activities. Porto Cervo 616

Description

Property Summary

The property named Nanai is a beautiful cottage built in 2009, located on a fenced 14,000 square meter property with a wildlife garden, trees, and a meadow. It offers a yard and parking spaces on the premises. The cottage is situated in the countryside, making it a perfect vacation rental for those seeking tranquility and proximity to nature.

Outdoors

The property boasts a spacious outdoor area, including a yard, wildlife garden, trees, and a meadow spanning 14,000 square meters. It also features an outdoor shower, allowing you to refresh after a day spent exploring the surroundings or enjoying the sun.

Other Information

Please note that the owner resides on the same premises as the vacation rental. The property can be accessed via a 30-meter-long motor access road (via an unmade road). Nearby amenities include a shop (6 km away), a restaurant (2 km away), and an outdoor swimming pool (6 km away).

Distances and Attractions

The property is conveniently located in the vicinity of several attractions:

- 7 km from the center of Baia Sardinia

- 12 km from the center of Arzachena, Italy

- 12 km from the center of Porto Cervo

- 2.5 km from the sea and the sandy beach "L'ea biancha"

- 10 km from an 18-hole golf course

- 9 km from a sailing school

- 7 km from a riding stable

- Hiking trails at San Panataleo (7 km away) Nanai

Description

Property Summary

The "Residenza Mediterranea" is a two-story residence comprising 100 apartments. It boasts a spacious 20,000 square meter property with a shared garden adorned with trees and a meadow. Additionally, it offers amenities such as a tennis court (extra charge), ample parking at the house located 50 meters away, and the option of an installment plan for your convenience.

Outdoors

The residence is nestled amidst a lush garden spanning 20,000 square meters, featuring trees and a meadow area, creating a serene and natural atmosphere for your vacation or holiday rental. While the garden is not fenced, it provides a picturesque setting for outdoor relaxation.

Other Information

Located in Cannigione, Italy, this residence offers convenient access to nearby amenities. A supermarket is situated just 300 meters away, ensuring you have easy access to essential supplies. For those seeking a beach getaway, a sandy beach is within an 800-meter radius, perfect for soaking up the sun and enjoying the crystal-clear waters of the Mediterranean.

Distances and Attractions

The "Residenza Mediterranea" is strategically positioned in the heart of Arzachena, Italy. It is just 250 meters from the center of Cannigione, a charming town known for its vibrant atmosphere. For those seeking a more upscale experience, Porto Cervo, a renowned destination, is merely 15 kilometers away. Nearby attractions include Arzachena (7.5 km), Baja Sardinia (11 km), Palau (15 km), and Olbia (27 km), offering a diverse range of activities and cultural experiences. Cannigione 614

Description

Property Summary

Villa Augusta is a cozy apartment house located in the charming hamlet of Cannigione, just 10 km from the vibrant center of Baja Sardinia, Arzachena, Italy. Nestled in a tranquil and sun-drenched position, it boasts direct access to the beach, merely 10 meters away. The property offers a delightful yard, reliable Internet Wi-Fi, and an installment plan for your convenience. Enjoy the proximity to the sea and the comfort of this vacation rental during your stay.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature as you step outside Villa Augusta. With its prime location just 10 meters from the sea, you'll enjoy direct access to the beach, providing endless opportunities for relaxation and water activities. Soak up the sun on the sandy shores of "La Conia" beach, a mere 5 meters away. Explore the nearby marina, situated 1.5 km from the property, and indulge in the seaside atmosphere.

Other Information

Villa Augusta offers the convenience of public parking just 50 meters away on the road. Nearby amenities include a supermarket within 1 km, a restaurant, and a bar, all within a 200-meter radius, ensuring you have access to essential services during your stay. Please note that having a car is recommended to fully explore the surrounding areas.

Distances and Attractions

While staying at Villa Augusta, you'll be within close proximity to several notable attractions. Arzachena, a delightful town, is just 10 km away, offering a glimpse into the local culture and charm. Porto Cervo, a renowned destination, is 16 km from the property, providing ample opportunities for exploration and entertainment. Palau, another captivating town, is a mere 13 km away, while the bustling city of Olbia is conveniently located 25 km from the vacation rental. Cannigione 700

Description

Property Summary

Small residence "Pineta Uno" is surrounded by trees and comprises 13 apartments in Arzachena, Italy. It offers amenities such as Internet Wifi, Parking, and an Installment Plan. This holiday rental is conveniently located 300 meters from the center of Baia Sardinia and 5 kilometers from the center of Porto Cervo.

Outdoors

The residence is situated on the outskirts of Baia Sardinia, just 250 meters from the sea. Nearby, you can find a sandy beach at a distance of 250 meters, a diving center at 300 meters, and a surf school also at 300 meters away.

Other Information

Within the complex, you'll find a reception area. Convenient amenities like a shop, supermarket, and restaurant are located within 300-500 meters from the property. Additionally, there is a golf course (18 holes) situated 15 kilometers away.

Distances and Attractions

The residence is 35 kilometers from the center of Olbia and 33 kilometers from the Olbia ferry terminal. Nearby attractions include Porto Cervo, located 5 kilometers away, and the beautiful sandy beaches just 250 meters from the residence. Baia Sardinia 615
